body.title: Request a Demo
body.description: See how OpenObserve can help you achieve powerful observability at a fraction of the cost. Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you shortly.

items.title: High Performance
items.description: 10x more efficient than other solutions with lower resource requirements.

items.title: Cost Effective
items.description: Save up to 70% on your observability costs compared to other solutions.

items.title: Secure & Compliant
items.description: Enterprise-grade security with role-based access control and data encryption.
items.icon: <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M12 22s8-4 8-10V5l-8-3-8 3v7c0 6 8 10 8 10z" /><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M9 12l2 2 4-4" />

items.title: Flexible Deployment
items.description: Deploy in the cloud, on-premises, or in a hybrid environment to meet your needs.
items.icon: <rect x='2' y='2' width='20' height='8' rx='2' ry='2' /><rect x='2' y='14' width='20' height='8' rx='2' ry='2' /><path d='M6 6h.01M6 18h.01' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' fill='none' />

seo.title: OpenObserve - Modern Observability for Modern Apps
seo.description: OpenObserve is an open-source observability platform designed for modern applications, providing powerful visibility at a fraction of the cost.
